comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: For what it's worth, this pic made it into the Kalgoorlie Western Argus in 1903...too bad about the dome!...it appeared in what looks like a picture postcard series on the Australian capital cities - nla.gov.au/nla.news-article32737006 'Wisdom' was the last of the Macquarie/Bridge St statues to be added...ca. 15/12/1880...see my statue comments at www.flickr.com/photos/state-records-nsw/3793507471/ (or click on Beachcomber's thumbnail above)
